quagga.input.subject: Re: 12 December Trade
quagga.input.body:
This confirmation should have the regular Omnibus Annex A attached as well as 
the additional Chilean Annex which Tana forwarded last week.  Please call me 
if you have any questions.

Mark




	Craig Breslau
	12/13/2000 01:51 PM
		 
		 To: Derek Bailey/Corp/Enron@ENRON, Tana Jones/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mark 
Taylor/HOU/ECT@ECT
		 cc: 
		 Subject: 12 December Trade

Can you please help me to resolve this ASAP.

Thank you,
Craig
---------------------- Forwarded by Craig Breslau/HOU/ECT on 12/13/2000 01:50 
PM ---------------------------


"Pablo Jaramillo" <pablo.jaramillo@gasmar.cl> on 12/13/2000 01:54:54 PM
To: <craig.Breslau@enron.com>
cc:  
Subject: 12 December Trade



I received from Derek Bailey the Confirmation Form  and the Chilean Annex, 
but I feel there is still missing the Annex A, as it is  refferred in the 
Confirmation Form as part of the terms and conditions of the  transaction. 
Please confirm.
?
Regards,
Pablo Jaramillo
?
?
